title: scoutos Evidence Object
description: Standardized schema for evidence collected by scoutos collectors.

evidence_id.description: A unique identifier (UUID) for this piece of evidence.

collector_name.description: The name of the collector that gathered this evidence.

collection_timestamp.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp of when the evidence was collected.

target_account_id.description: The ID of the account or environment the evidence was collected from.

evidence_payload.description: The actual evidence data, which can be any valid JSON object or array.
